bibl.title: All by Posidippus?

series.title: Hellenica. Testi e strumenti di letteratura greca antica, medievale e umanistica.

bibl.title: Des Géants à Dionysos. Mélanges de mythologie et de poésie grecques offerts à Francis Vian
bibl.author: LLOYD-JONES, Hugh

bibl.note: The Milan papyrus [P. Mil. Vogl. VIII, 309] could contain part of a collection of epigrams entitled SvrÒw (which included at least one poem by Posidippus). <Soros>

Domenico ACCORINTI et Pierre CHUVIN (Édd.), Des Géants à Dionysos. Mélanges de mythologie et de poésie grecques offerts à Francis Vian = Hellenica. Testi e strumenti di letteratura greca antica, medievale e umanistica. 10 (Alessandria, 2003) pp. 277-280.
